text: 高级白领肖亚文，为了能在私募基金解散后继续和自己的老板丁元英保持联系，而专门飞往法兰克福找她身为刑警的同学芮小丹帮忙，希望她可以照看丁元英在古城的几年生活
prompt: best quality,masterpiece,illustration, an extremely delicate and beautiful,extremely detailed,CG,unity,8k wallpaper, In this scene, we see an upscale professional, Xia Yawen, who is trying to maintain her connection with her boss, Ding Yuan Ying, after the private fund is dismantled. To do this, she decides to fly to法兰克福 and ask her former classmate, Ruan Xiaodan, for help. Ruan Xiaodan, who is now a police officer, is described as being responsible for looking after丁元英 during his years in the city. The scene is set in a modern cityscape with tall buildings and a busy street.

text: 肖亚文如此大动干戈，甚至有些低声下气来讨好芮小丹的原因仅仅是因为她不想让自己和丁元英的联系从此断裂
prompt:
best quality,masterpiece,illustration, an extremely delicate and beautiful,extremely detailed,CG,unity,8k wallpaper, The scene opens with Xia Yawen standing before a group of people, her voice low and respectful. She is surrounded by people she needs to win over, including Ruan Xiaodan.

Xia Yawen: "I understand that you have concerns about my relationship with Mr. Ding. I want you to know that my actions are in line with my beliefs and values. I have always wanted to pursue a relationship with someone who is truly special, and I believe that Mr. Ding is that person. However, I understand if you have concerns. I will do everything in my power to address them."

Ruan Xiaodan (smiling): "I appreciate your honesty, Xia Yawen. I trust you and your intentions. You have always been a valuable friend to me, and I value our friendship. I will support you in whatever you do."

Xia Yawen (tearfully): "Thank you, Ruan. I know how much this means to me. I don't want to risk our friendship and the bond we have built. I will do everything in my power to make this work."

The scene ends with Xia Yawen bowing to the group, looking up at Ruan Xiaodan with a mixture of感激 and sadness.
